attributes.action: Fair Pay for the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that we should increase pay for the lower ranks in the armed forces to  ensure that they have a better standard of living and in recognition of the service the do for this country.  

Salary for lower ranks should be in line with other public servants such as the Police and commensurate with the risks they take whilst on active service.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
